alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 8:13PM EDT until July 05 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 812 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fairview In Union County to Clover, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Indian Land, Andrew Jackson State Park, Van Wyck, Carolina Commons Shopping Center and Community of Almond Glen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
